user@localhost:~/test$ singularity storage update local name
ID  Name  Type   Path  
1   name  local  /tmp  

user@localhost:~/test$ singularity --verbose storage update local name
ID  Name  CreatedAt            UpdatedAt            Type   Path  Config  
1   name  2023-04-05 06:07:08  2023-04-05 06:07:08  local  /tmp  <nil>
